meanings.definition: A unit or component that is assembled separately and then incorporated into a larger assembly.
meanings.sent1: The subassembly of the engine was carefully crafted before being added to the car.
meanings.sent2: The subassembly of the toy car included the wheels, axles, and body.
meanings.sent3: The subassembly of the puzzle pieces made it easier for the child to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: Each ingredient in the recipe acted as a subassembly, coming together to create a delicious dish.
meanings.sent5: The subassembly of the book chapters formed a captivating story for the readers.

meanings.definition: The act of assembling or putting together smaller components to create a larger unit.
meanings.sent1: The subassembly of the furniture required careful attention to detail.
meanings.sent2: The subassembly of the model airplane was a fun and challenging task.
meanings.sent3: The subassembly of the Lego pieces turned into a creative masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her subassembly of ideas led to a brilliant solution for the problem.
meanings.sent5: The subassembly of the team members resulted in a successful project completion.
